ISSUE.TITLE: [DISCUSS]: allow user to specify APISIX id in config.yaml
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: Currently, the id of APISIX is generated UUID, which can't be controlled by the user. I think it would be good to allow user to specify a meaningful id to bind APISIX instance with their internal system.
